body: Oh nice. The NTR fake-out was so interesting. It’s like the wife did this to show Sekawa she’s not interested in him. The thing where the husband’s gonna arrive late, but is just fifteen minutes late was so funny. Using NTR conventions then subverting our expectations. It’s also the opposite of NTR where the person the wife trusts to tell her kinks is the husband and not some random outsider. Page 4 is interesting cause she clearly leads him into the “baby” room to set him up.
Not really ntr since he isnt in a relationship with her
Just a bit of scat. Also the tiniest hint of NTR?
